titles.title: Let All That Is Within Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let all that is within me cry Holy (Glory, Jesus) Let all that is within me cry Holy (Glory, Jesus){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy (holy) holy (holy) holy is the Lamb that was slain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glory (glory) glory (glory) glory to the Lamb that was slain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus (Jesus) Jesus (Jesus) Jesus is the Lamb that was slain.{/lang-eng}
